CustomField.description: The threshold of the number of line items in the cart when exceeded indicates a large cart. A value of -1 inactivates the threshold. A large cart influences how items are processed in the application to stay under various platform governor limits..
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The threshold of the number of line items in the cart when exceeded indicates a large cart. A value of -1 inactivates the threshold. A large cart influences how items are processed in the application to stay under various platform governor limits..
CustomField.label: Large Cart Threshold
